attributes.action: Stop the opening of a NEW walking shop in Keswick Town centre and replace with a more practical shop.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the closure of Woolworths in Keswick there has been no where to shop for the small pieces of hardware CDs, DVDs and allsorts in Keswick. There are over 15 walking shops in Keswick and there needs to be a new practical shop.
Keswick is only a small town but needs its facilities otherwise we are travelling to the nearest town Cockermouth or Penrith to buy the small things that we really need in Keswick.
We need a new practical shop in the town where people can buy what they need from day to day.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
